oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Balm for the Weary and the Wounded" by Rev. C.T. Quintard
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This printed booklet is titled "Balm for the Weary and the Wounded" and is written by Rev. C.T. Quintard, Chaplain 1st Tenn. Reg.t, C.S.A. Publication information is "Columbia: Evans and Cogswell, Printers. 1864." On the front page is written, "L. Polk, May 12, 186(illegible) and June 12, 1864." Both Rev. Quintard and Gen. Leonidas Polk had been associated with the University of the South before the Civil War.
